message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase a unique product. Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $950,000 is a significant drop from my initial ask.  This product offers substantial value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.

I'm still a bit higher than your initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer $1,025,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
